post.body: Etwas früh oder? Happy Old Year
For the late party events I expect one special gf will try to toss me into. My politic: No suite, no crowd, no flu :-)
Offline soon. A last Happy New Year #HPN from me from #Hamburg #Germany on the 1st day of 2009. Btw: I love #identica much much more than t.
Worst arrogant american management title extension ever: EMEA (Europe, Middle East and Africa)

Cool bike :) http://tinyurl.com/8vxlvl
Klasseinterview & tollen Kommentarstrang mit Spannung gelesen. http://ur1.ca/0l58
Contacts needed. Have to setup 1 small #OpenSolaris server w ZFS RAID-Z SMB etc. in Jan. & might need hints if running into OS problems.
#2009 #1 Happy New Year! - Back home 30m ago after orgiastic 5* hotel bar party & pub. Coffe now. No energy for mackarel breakfast yet. #HPN
Offline & #HPN VII. with the very special 'Magic Moments – Perry Como' #np http://blip.fm/profile/RossanaBocca/blip/2298907 See you 2009!
#HPN VI.: Happy NewYear - Barbecue somebody? Grill anwerfen? http://www.westropolis.de/akyuen/stories/47022/

#HPN IV.: Happy New Year - Without words: "@remsays: A tournament, a tournament, a tournament of lies"
Offline soon. Preparation for #NYE & all that #HPN shouting needs preparation. Will we see us again in 2008?
#HPN III.: Happy New Year - Go green & sell your car http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/5508/02gv4.jpg
#HPN II: Happy New Year - The best self reference of the day: http://www.twoogie.com/Markus_Merz
#HPN I: Happy New Year - #Geek photo of the day: http://twitpic.com/yadj
My stomach tells me to eat something. I could start with canned fish with much oil & have a thai soup later. Preparation is all...
